channel.title: Un-Portforwarding Utorrent
channel.description:
Hey, I used Utorrent to port forward my server and well...shit happened =(. I can't connect to the server anymore. Q1: Is there a way to un-portforward using utorrent? Q2: If there isn't, is there a way to change the server port? Q3: Would changing it work lol?
Thanks...

item.title: Un-Portforwarding Utorrent
item.dc:creator: @Just_Lurkin Just Lurkin
item.description:
@Just_Lurkin wrote:

Hey, I used Utorrent to port forward my server and well…shit happened =(.
I can’t connect to the server anymore.
Q1: Is there a way to un-portforward using utorrent?
Q2: If there isn’t, is there a way to change the server port?
Q3: Would changing it work lol?

Thanks…
